sentences.en: And can you honestly tell me that you don't watch Sampras or Rafter.
sentences.cn: 你能忠实地告诉我你不看桑普拉斯或者拉夫特吗?

sentences.en: And she began to feel dizzy and fell off the rafter.
sentences.cn: 她开始觉得头晕了就从屋梁上掉了下来.

sentences.en: From the top rafter, a great horned owl swiveled its head to look at us.
sentences.cn: 筒仓顶部的边缘上, 一只很大的猫头鹰转着它的头看着我们.

sentences.en: RAFTER was not well received. At first it was just a rustle.
sentences.cn: “筏夫”并未受到欢迎.起初只是出现一阵低语声.

sentences.en: Son with flying eaves, rafter length ratio is about five to two.
sentences.cn: 檐椽与飞子的长度之比约五比二.

sentences.en: The big rafter is visible in this room.
sentences.cn: 这间屋子粗大的椽子可以看得见.

sentences.en: The carpenter working on the rafter passed his axe down to his mate below.
sentences.cn: 在椽子上干活的木匠将斧子传给下面的伙伴.

sentences.en: The club was packed to the rafters (= very full ) .
The little red hen kept watching him rafter.
sentences.cn: 小红鸡就这样坐在屋梁上一直看着他.

sentences.en: The main building are the use of fly rafter brackets, elegant shape.
sentences.cn: 主体建筑均使用斗拱飞椽, 造形美观大方.

sentences.en: The police had searched the house from cellar to rafter.
sentences.cn: 警察已把那座房子上上下下搜遍了.

sentences.en: When the hell did you say you developed this RAFTER?
sentences.cn: 你说你到底在什么时候研究出了这个“筏夫”?
